question: What depth should walkthroughs trace to?

options.description: Epic/sub-epic level - trace major object flows without deep nesting
options.when_to_use: Well-understood domain, proven patterns, low risk

options.description: Story/AC level - trace complete scenarios through all collaborations
options.when_to_use: Moderate complexity, some uncertainty, standard integration

options.description: Step/Given level - trace every nested call, parameter, and return value
options.when_to_use: High uncertainty, complex algorithms, critical integrations, novel patterns

options.description: Variable depth - detailed for risky areas, high-level for proven areas
options.when_to_use: Mixed complexity across system, focus effort where it matters
